title: Google directly integrating Air Raid Alerts into Android phones in Ukraine
content:
Google today issued an update on its response to the war in Ukraine. Among other ongoing efforts, Android users in Ukraine will soon have rapid Air Raid Alerts natively built into their phones. 

more…

The post Google directly integrating Air Raid Alerts into Android phones in Ukraine appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: As part of ongoing support efforts, Android users in Ukraine will have rapid Air Raid Alerts natively built into their phones...
